forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High near 70F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. Low around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.
